title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Strategies for Promoting Learner Autonomy in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans in online environments.
Learners can foster collaborative learning environments with peer learners using mobile microlearning tools
Learners can practice strategies for enhancing online learning autonomy and present results through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
